intro: Now that we've defined Direction, we are ready to create the attributes of the Moves model.
tasks: In the Moves model below, add a field called "remaining" of type u8.
Also add a field called "last_direction" of type Direction.
hints: This model will be used to store the state of movement for one player.
Think about an instance of this model as a row in a database table with a primary key that references one player.
